source:
%%sql
-- Build comment_type_reference_dim table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW service_user_dim_new

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T3.casereference IS NULL
        THEN T1.ServiceDataID
        ELSE NULL
    END                             AS ServiceDataID, -- surrogate key
    T3.id                           AS TicketID,
    T3.casereference                AS CaseReference,
    T3.sourcesuid                   AS SUAreaID,
    T3.salutation                   AS Salutation,
    T3.firstname                    AS FirstName, 
    T3.lastname                     AS LastName,
    T3.addressline1                 AS AddressLine1,
    T3.addressline2                 AS AddressLine2,
    T3.addresstown                  AS AddressTown,
    T3.addresscounty                AS AddressCounty,
    T3.postcode                     AS Postcode,
    'United Kingdom'                AS AddressCountry,
    T3.organisation                 AS Organisation,
    T3.organisationtype             AS OrganisationType,
    T3.serviceusertype              AS ServiceUserType,
    T3.role                         AS Role,
    T3.telephonenumber              AS TelephoneNumber,
    T3.otherphonenumber             AS OtherPhoneNumber,
    T3.faxnumber                    AS FaxNumber,
    T3.emailaddress                 AS EmailAddress,
    T2.SourceSystemID               AS SourceSystemID, -- NOT CORRECT
    to_timestamp(T3.ingested_datetime)  AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                            AS ValidTo,
    md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(T3.casereference,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T3.firstname,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T3.lastname,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T3.emailaddress,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T3.postcode,'.'),
            IFNULL(T3.organisation,'.'),
            IFNULL(T3.serviceusertype,'.')
        ))                          AS RowID,
    'Y'                             AS IsActive,
    T1.IsActive                     AS HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_harmonised_db.service_user_dim T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 
    ON "Appeals" = T2.Description
FULL JOIN odw_standardised_db.horizon_service_user_new T3 
    ON T1.CaseReference = T3.casereference
        AND T1.TicketID = T3.id
        AND T1.IsActive = 'Y'

WHERE
    (-- flags new data        
        (CASE
            WHEN T3.casereference = T1.CaseReference 
            AND md5(
                concat(
                    IFNULL(T3.casereference,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T3.firstname,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T3.lastname,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T3.emailaddress,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T3.postcode,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T3.organisation,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T3.serviceusertype,'.')
                )) <> T1.RowID
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T1.ServiceDataID IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' )
    )
    AND T3.casereference IS NOT NULL
    AND T3.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_service_user_new)
;

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY  VIEW service_user_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

Select
    ServiceDataID,
    TicketID,
    CaseReference,
    SUAreaID,
    Salutation,
    FirstName,
    LastName,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressTown,
    AddressCounty,
    Postcode,
    AddressCountry,
    Organisation,
    OrganisationType,
    ServiceUserType,
    Role,
    TelephoneNumber,
    OtherPhoneNumber,
    FaxNumber,
    EmailAddress,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From service_user_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT
    ServiceDataID,
    TicketID,
    CaseReference,
    SUAreaID,
    Salutation,
    FirstName,
    LastName,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressTown,
    AddressCounty,
    Postcode,
    AddressCountry,
    Organisation,
    OrganisationType,
    ServiceUserType,
    Role,
    TelephoneNumber,
    OtherPhoneNumber,
    FaxNumber,
    EmailAddress,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.service_user_dim T1
WHERE CaseReference IN (SELECT CaseReference FROM service_user_dim_new WHERE ServiceDataID IS NULL) 
    AND TicketID IN (SELECT TicketID FROM service_user_dim_new WHERE CaseReference = T1.CaseReference AND CaseReference IS NULL)
    AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM service_user_dim_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW service_user_dim_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    ServiceDataID,
    TicketID,
    CaseReference,
    SUAreaID,
    Salutation,
    FirstName,
    LastName,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressTown,
    AddressCounty,
    Postcode,
    AddressCountry,
    Organisation,
    OrganisationType,
    ServiceUserType,
    Role,
    TelephoneNumber,
    OtherPhoneNumber,
    FaxNumber,
    EmailAddress,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM service_user_dim_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

%%sql

-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.service_user_dim AS Target
USING service_user_dim_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.ServiceDataID = Target.ServiceDataID

-- For Updates existing rows
WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (ServiceDataID,
        TicketID,
        CaseReference,
        SUAreaID,
        Salutation,
        FirstName,
        LastName,
        AddressLine1,
        AddressLine2,
        AddressTown,
        AddressCounty,
        Postcode,
        AddressCountry,
        Organisation,
        OrganisationType,
        ServiceUserType,
        Role,
        TelephoneNumber,
        OtherPhoneNumber,
        FaxNumber,
        EmailAddress,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)  
        VALUES (Source.ServiceDataID,
        Source.TicketID,
        Source.CaseReference,
        Source.SUAreaID,
        Source.Salutation,
        Source.FirstName,
        Source.LastName,
        Source.AddressLine1,
        Source.AddressLine2,
        Source.AddressTown,
        Source.AddressCounty,
        Source.Postcode,
        Source.AddressCountry,
        Source.Organisation,
        Source.OrganisationType,
        Source.ServiceUserType,
        Source.Role,
        Source.TelephoneNumber,
        Source.OtherPhoneNumber,
        Source.FaxNumber,
        Source.EmailAddress,
        Source.SourceSystemID, 
        Source.IngestionDate, 
        Source.ValidTo, 
        Source.RowID, 
        Source.IsActive)

%%sql
-- Insert new SXOID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.service_user_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ServiceDataID NULLS LAST) AS ServiceDataID,
    TicketID,
    CaseReference,
    SUAreaID,
    Salutation,
    FirstName,
    LastName,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressTown,
    AddressCounty,
    Postcode,
    AddressCountry,
    Organisation,
    OrganisationType,
    ServiceUserType,
    Role,
    TelephoneNumber,
    OtherPhoneNumber,
    FaxNumber,
    EmailAddress,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.service_user_dim;
